channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 16th April
item.description:
Please send to AHR Blocked Gully Needs clearing. Water running down the edge of the road, causing edge deteriorations. Please see photo
Report on FixMyStreet
